remarks: The predicate "is a W atom" (corresponding to fiducial atom ` D ` ). (Contributed by NM, 26-Jan-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
watomfval.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
watomfval.p $e |- P = ( _|_P ` K ) $.
watomfval.w $e |- W = ( WAtoms ` K ) $.
iswatN $p |- ( ( K e. B /\ D e. A ) -> ( P e. ( W ` D ) <-> ( P e. A /\ -. P e. ( ( _|_P ` K ) ` { D } ) ) ) ) $.
